label: customer buying behavior
description: customer buying behavior

label: governmental pesticide qunatity
description: governmental guideline to only spray less (mean of pest_quantity)

label: lifespan of the machine
description: timespan of the model

label: potential plant damage
description: potential damage the plants could take if no spraying is done, influenced by weather, pests, diseases, biodiversity, etc

label: biodiversity
description: relative biodiversity prone to changes

label: water contamination
description: relative water contamination prone to changes

label: effective area of one machine
description: area one sprayer can effectivly manage

label: discount rate
description: discount rate, reducing future costs and benefits to their present value (%)

label: farmers miscalculation of pesticide quantity
description: the farmer tries to spray enough to have 0 plant damage, but there is a chance he miscalculated how much he needs to spray

label: time delay of government decision
description: time from government decision to implementation of intervention

label: initial costs normal sprayer
description: investmant costs for a manual section controled sprayer (Euro)

label: initial upgrade cost
description: upgrade costs to automate a manual section controled sprayer (Euro)

label: market price euro/t
description: fruit price (Euro/t)

label: pesticide costs
description: costs of pesticides (Euro/ha)

label: reduction of pesticide quantity
description: reduction of pesticide usage with the automated section controled sprayer, compared to the manuale one

label: yield t/ha
description: yield (t/ha)

label: biodiversity effect on government
description: influence of pesticides quantity (through biodiversity) on customer buying behavior

label: biodiversity effect on government
description: influence form biodiversity on government concern

label: chance of government intervention
description: gerneral chance that government intervenes

label: pesticide effect on biodiversity
description: influence percentage from pesticide usage of the previous year on biodiversity

label: pesticide effect on water contamination
description: influence percentage from pesticide usage of the previous year on water contamination

label: water contamination effect on pesticide
description: influence percentage from water contamination on biodiversity

label: water contamination effect on customer
description: influence of pesticides quantity (through water contamination) on customer buying behavior

description: influence form water contamination on government concern
